Events
Halfway to Margaritaville’s Favorite Holiday
Why wait until February to raise a glass? On
September 4th
, Margaritaville is bringing the party early with specials, sips, and a toast to paradise!
All-Day Specials
$7 Traditional Margaritas (Happy Hour recipe)
$6 Espolòn Tequila shots
$7 Chips & Salsa
$9 Chips & Queso
15% off Retail Purchases
In-House Events
5PM Great Margarita Toast
– Join the fun and keep it going with $1 Party Shots!
6PM Margarita Master Class
– Learn the art of the perfect marg in a ticketed event.
Jimmy Buffett Day – August 29
Celebrate Jimmy’s legacy with specialty drinks in limited-edition JB Cups, plus tie-in retail and a donation to Singing for Change.
5 O’Clock Towel – Purchase With Purchase Offer
When guests spend $40+, offer them the fan-favorite 5 O’Clock towel for just $17.
Coco Cabana – Parrot Bay Bucket Drink
A tropical 32oz cocktail served in a collectible Parrot Bay bucket. Perfect for photo-worthy cheers!
Barton Springs Break – CORE Charity Cocktail
This cocktail supports CORE: Children of Restaurant Employees. Donations from Tito’s, Island Oasis, and IMC is going directly to the cause, so every sip supports families in hospitality.
Come in and try the new Lakay Burger today
This year for World Burger Tour, Hard Rock Cafe Miami has created The Lakay Burger! A signature steak burger with creole seasoning, monterey jack cheese, fajita-style peppers and onions, lettuce and tomato.
Hard Rock Cafe chefs from around the world were challenged to develop unique burger creations that showcase elements from their regional cultures and personal taste.
These innovative recipes are available exclusively at each chef’s local cafe for you to try, competing for a chance to be featured on global Hard Rock Cafe menus later this summer.
Book Your Table
Kiddos Back to School and 12th Anniversary Event
Saturday, August 2nd
11:00 AM – 3:00 PM
Bayside Marketplace – Bayside Field
401 Biscayne Blvd. Miami FL 33132
Let’s Get Everyone Ready for School.
One day filled with family-friendly activities and entertainment! Come to celebrate
Kiddos Magazine
12th Anniversary and Back to School event, all in one awesome party! Art station, snacks demo, toddler zone, Storytime, live performances, characters, hula hoop & sack race contest, food, goodie bags, music, raffles, and much more!
Kiddos Back to School and 12th Anniversary event is free and open to the community with Eventbrite registration. Follow us on
Instagram
and receive highlights about the event activities and exhibitors participating!
Register to attend
Own the Week with Hard Rock Cafe Miami!
Join us at Hard Rock Cafe every day of the week and experience something NEW!
Enjoy $10 Jumbo Classic Margaritas ALL DAY on Mondays. Get tropical every Tuesday for TAKO TIKI Tuesday, where you can enjoy two signature Takos and a Tiki drink for $20!
Winning Wednesday makes sure you are the WINNER with 1/2 off Tupelo Dippers, Draft Beers and Bottles of Wine.
Thursdays offers a blast to the past with Throwback Thursday, where you can enjoy a Classic Burger, Fries and a Coke Float for $19.71
Available Monday through Thursday
Book Your Table
CHRISTMAS IN JULY HOLIDAY PARTY EARLY BOOKING SPECIALS!
It’s the most wonderful time of the year—and the perfect moment to plan your Jingle Jubilee with colleagues, family, and friends at Hard Rock Cafe Miami!
Whether you’re hosting a festive office gathering or a cozy get-together with loved ones, we’re here to make your celebration unforgettable. Our holiday party perks are sure to spread cheer:
Complimentary Family-Style Appetizer for your group
Welcome Champagne Toast or Cocktail on arrival
2 Hours of Complimentary Entertainment
Free Upgrade to your selected bar package
10% Off food and non-alcoholic beverage event menus
Hard Rock-Themed Chocolates for all guests at departure
Let us take care of the details while you enjoy the magic of the season. Dates are filling up fast—book your holiday party today and make it a celebration to remember!
Book My Holiday Party
BOOK YOUR FANTASY FOOTBALL DRAFT PARTY NOW
Host your Gridiron Gathering Draft Party with us and receive complimentary A/V services, private rooms for 3 hours*, and draft party set up all for a game-winning event!
Celebrate with our awesome Tailgate Menu! Pick 2 for $25, 3 for $35 or 4 for $45! Add our amazing Beverage packages!
SUPER POUR – $1 MORE Enjoy a 20 oz. Draft Beer for $1 more.
BOTTLED BEER BUCKETS | 5 FOR $25 OR 25 FOR $100
Book Your Table
NEW LandShark Bar & Grill Lunch Menu – Starting at $11.99!
Step away from the office and into paradise with our all-new lunch menu at LandShark Bar & Grill! Starting at just $11.99, enjoy fresh, flavorful options like the Caribbean Chicken Salad, Crispy Chicken Tacos, Fried Shrimp Basket, and more. Whether you’re grabbing a quick bite or making it a midday escape, we’ve got your lunch covered. Available Monday through Friday until 3 PM—because lunch should be more than just another meeting at your desk.
Paradise Points Loyalty Program
Earn rewards and exclusive perks! Download the
Paradise Points app
today and start earning points for every bite and sip.
Options:
Unlock paradise in every visit. #ParadisePoints
Good food. Great rewards. #EarnInParadise
Happy Hour Drink Specials
Raise your glass to great times! Cheers with our delicious drink specials during Happy Hour.
Options:
Sip, relax, repeat.
#HappyHourVibes
Good drinks. Great friends. Even better prices. #ParadiseSips
Find your paradise — one sip at a time
#CheersToThat
Kids Pirate Ship Meal
Your kid’s dining adventure just got epic! The Pirate package includes:
Pirate Ship Plate
Light-Up Sword
Ice Cream Sandwich
Options:
Argh Matey!
This dining adventure is kid-approved! #PirateMeal
Set sail for flavor and fun — only for our littlest mates! #FamilyTimeDoneRight

Builder #page
Home
Contact
Contact Bayside
Bayside is located on Biscayne Bay in the heart of Downtown Miami and easily accessible from South Florida’s major highways and is close to international airports and cruise ports.  This two-level, open-air center features more 150 shops including unique and national retailers, as well as impeccable international cuisine such as Bubba Gump, Hard Rock Cafe, Margaritaville, Kuba Cabana, Black Market Miami and more.
In addition to the numerous shopping and dining options, visitors can also enjoy lively performances from Miami’s best local musicians or hop on a refreshing Bay cruise, from tours of the celebrity homes on Star Island to gambling cruises.
Bayside is a world-class tourist attraction and a destination in “The Magic City”.
For general inquiries, feedback, or assistance, please reach out to our friendly customer service team:
Phone: 1-(305) 577-3344
Management OFFICE
